snippet: Laurence Tubiana, France’s top climate change envoy, is deploying the full extent of her and her country’s charms in hopes of facilitating an accord.
abstract: France, hosting international conference on climate change, takes pains to create  best possible environment for diplomacy; climate change ambassador Laurence Tubiana says country wants to avoid mistakes made by Danish hosts at 2009 summit, which academics attribute to its failure.
lead_paragraph: Laurence Tubiana, France’s top climate change envoy, is deploying the full extent of her and her country’s charms in hopes of facilitating an accord.

headline.main: At Paris Climate Talks, Top French Envoy Tries to Avoid Mistakes of Past Hosts
headline.print_headline: At World Climate Talks, Top French Envoy Tries to Avoid Mistakes of Past Hosts

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
